verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Sometimes] [ARG0: the media] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: gets] [ARG1: it wrong] . For example , every article about “ will Trump testify ? ” Well obviously the answer is NO . He can never testify . Five minutes in a room with Mueller , and he will be in jail along with all his family and friends for ...

Sometimes the media just gets it wrong . For example , every article about “ [V: will] Trump testify ? ” Well obviously the answer is NO . He can never testify . Five minutes in a room with Mueller , and he will be in jail along with all his family and friends for ...

Sometimes the media just gets it wrong . For example , every article about “ will Trump testify ? ” [ARGM-DIS: Well] [ARGM-ADV: obviously] [ARG1: the answer] [V: is] [ARG2: NO .] He can never testify . Five minutes in a room with Mueller , and he will be in jail along with all his family and friends for ...

Sometimes the media just gets it wrong . For example , every article about “ will Trump testify ? ” Well obviously the answer is NO . He [V: can] never testify . Five minutes in a room with Mueller , and he will be in jail along with all his family and friends for ...

Sometimes the media just gets it wrong . For example , every article about “ will Trump testify ? ” Well obviously the answer is NO . [ARG0: He] [ARGM-MOD: can] [ARGM-NEG: never] [V: testify] . Five minutes in a room with Mueller , and he will be in jail along with all his family and friends for ...

Sometimes the media just gets it wrong . For example , every article about “ will Trump testify ? ” Well obviously the answer is NO . He can never testify .
